title: Ask Crystal: How do I get my spouse on board with budgeting?
description: Every Thursday in 2025, I’ll be answering a question on money and/or budgeting. If you have a question you’d love for me to answer in an upcoming post, please submit it here. Today’s question is one that I hear often: “How do I get my spouse on board with budgeting?” -K When my husband and IRead More
author: Crystal Paine
